radiographic_examinations.findings: A single new high-signal intensity lesion in segment III of the liver measuring 8 mm, consistent with either cyst or hemangioma. CBD is dilated up to 1 cm with mild left intrahepatic biliary dilatation. Multiple small stones in the gallbladder, no gallbladder distention or wall thickening. Normal pancreas, spleen, adrenals; right kidney shows moderate hydronephrosis with proximal hydroureter.
